title: LF duo partner
body:
So looking for duo partner.
Currently silver 3 i think, highest was plat 4 a couple seasons ago, looking to get back around there soon.
Prefer someone around gold skill level to make climbing easier. Be chill, dont skitz and dont be overly weird.
If you show unnecessary anger towards a team mate ill literally delete you when the game ends I dont care how good you are.
I play adc mid or jungle.
add me IGN for a chat - 8000000
